titleStmt.title: The faithfull depositaty [sic] of sound doctrine and ancient truths maintained against all oppositions of science, falsely so called, and against the prophane and vaine bablings of unsound teachers, or, A treatise on the I Tim. 6. 20 / by R.J., D.D. ; with the authors farewell to his hearers, readers, if not to the world.
titleStmt.author: Jenison, Robert, 1584?-1652.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, stained, print show-through, and loss of test.
Reproduction of original in Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
